author: costin
msg: Added tests for JDK1.4 and JMX.
( I haven't checked in the jmx part - it's still to early )

author: costin
msg: It'll eventually implement the shared-memory based channel. It is
not easy, but possible - if JPDA can do it, we should be able to do it too.
Not for now, of course - it'll need a lot of work for the general case,
but we should at least better organize the Shm code.

author: costin
msg: Started some work on the 1.4 based scoreboard.
This will use NIO to support the memory mapped file without requiring JNI.
If you remember, this was one of the reasons for using MsgAjp in each
shmem slot - the scoreboard will be accessed from java and C, and there's no
way to know how C structures are layed out.
We still need to 'fix' the head - since it uses a C struct at this moment.

author: costin
msg: Add support for 'group' attribute ( when adding a new channel ).
Fix a bug with IntrospectionUtil ( it needs to detect itself the boolean
Update the message to include what's coded on the C side.

author: costin
msg: Remove the direct calls to shm, will go through a jk layer.
